name: [GB] STASIS
description:
CONTROLS:
UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT = D-PAD
Z = A /// X = B /// ENTER = START /// SHIFT = SELECT

My first entry into a GameJam after learning how to use GB Studio in late July 2021.
STASIS IS CURRENTLY STILL IN DEVELOPMENT

Created a playable Demo for GB COMPO 21, all 2d assets and scripting created by me. Audio taken from free sources (to be replaced)

FEATURES:
Player Customization with 24 Outcomes
Working Elevator System
Working Rock, Paper, Scissors System
Working 3x3 Sliding Puzzle System
Unique Menu System
Unique Sprites & Mechanics
